Alondite.description: Enables wielder to counter-attack regardless of attacker's range.

Urvan.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If unit receives consecutive attacks, damage from second attack onward reduced by 80%.

Geirskögul.description: Grants Def+3. Grants allies with sword, lance, axe, bow, or dagger within 2 spaces Atk/Spd+3 during combat.

Mulagir.description: Effective against flying units. Grants Spd+3. If foe is magic user, foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) are nullified during combat.

Blazing Durandal.description: Grants Atk+3. If unit's Atk > foe's, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

Cursed Lance.description: Grants Atk/Spd+2 and accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). Unit takes 4 damage after combat.

Armads.description: Unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack when attacked at HP ≥ 80%.

Assassin's Bow.description: Effective against flying units. If target has a dagger, it cannot make a follow-up attack and this unit will.

Assassin's Bow+.description: Effective against flying units. If target has a dagger, it cannot make a follow-up attack and this unit will.

Guard Bow.description: Effective against flying units. Grants Def/Res+6 during combat if unit is attacked by foe using bow, daggers, magic, or staff.

Guard Bow+.description: Effective against flying units. Grants Def/Res+6 during combat if unit is attacked by foe using bow, daggers, magic, or staff.

Aura.description: Restores 5 HP to adjacent allies after any combat this unit initiates.

Berkut's Lance.description: Grants Res+4 when the unit is under attack.

Berkut's Lance+.description: Grants Res+4 when the unit is under attack.

refinable.description: Grants Res+7 when the unit is under attack.

Binding Blade.description: Grants +2 Def/Res when this unit is attacked.

Blárblade.description: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). Adds total bonuses on unit to attack.

Blárblade+.description: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). Adds total bonuses on unit to attack.

Blárowl.description: During combat, unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res boosted by number of adjacent allies × 2.

Blárowl+.description: During combat, unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res boosted by number of adjacent allies × 2.

Nidhogg.description: Effective against flying units. During combat, unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res boosted by number of adjacent allies x 2.

Blárraven.description: Grants weapon advantage vs. colorless foes.

Blárraven+.description: Grants weapon advantage vs. colorless foes.

Blessed Bouquet.description: Grants allies withing 2 spaces Def/Res+2 through their next actions after any combat this unit initiates.

Blessed Bouquet+.description: Grants allies withing 2 spaces Def/Res+2 through their next actions after any combat this unit initiates.

refinable.description: Grants allies withing 2 spaces Def/Res+5 through their next actions after any combat this unit initiates.

Blue Egg+.description: If unit initiates attack, unit recovers 4 HP after the battle.

refinable.description: Unit recovers 4 HP after battle.

Brave Axe+.description: Spd-5. Attack twice when initiating combat.

Brave Bow+.description: Spd-5. Effective against flying units. Attack twice when initiating combat.

Brave Sword+.description: Spd-5. Attack twice when initiating combat.

Dark Aura.description: Grants adjacent allies who use swords, axes, lances, or dragonstones Atk+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Dark Breath.description: After this unit attacks, foes within 2 spaces of target suffer Atk/Spd-5 through their next actions.

Eckesachs.description: Inflicts Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Élivágar.description: If unit initiates attack, bonuses on foes within 2 spaces of the target become penalties through their next actions.

Emerald Axe.description: Gives Atk+20% if weapon triangle advantage, Atk-20% if disadvantage.
